revised_title: Description and Analysis of Ceratodus, a New Genus of Ganoid Fishes in Queensland, Australia
tldr: The author describes the discovery of Ceratodus, a new genus of ganoid fish found in Queensland, Australia. The fish has a unique skeleton, coexistence of a lung with gills, and similar dentition to other species. The author also discusses the geographical distribution, habits, and diet of Ceratodus, as well as its possible evolutionary connections to other ancient and modern fish species.
